channel.title: Admin Only Zone
channel.description: So i posted one of these before, your probably getting annoyed by me. Buttttt, i need to make an admin only area, Does anyone have One that they can paste here? So i can Edit it? I'm not trying to leech you or anything, or EXPLAIN how..?

item.title: Admin Only Zone
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

Add these:

[code]public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
return false;
}

public boolean isInAdminZone() {
if (isInArea(*, *, *, *)) return true;
return false;
}[/code]

Change * to coordinates, the above boolean is self-explanatory. Then add this void:

public void secksisuber () { if(isInAdminZone && playerRights < 2) youDied(); }

Then under public boolean process, put this

secksisuber();

Made that in like 1 minute, tell me if it’s buggy.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin Only Zone
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Just edit the “####” To the X and Y coordinates of the zone you want it to go to.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("az") && (playerRights >= 2)) { { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You teleport to the administrator zone!"); } }
